resources.string: Join us and Make your wish fulfilled and delivered.
This app needs access to your file storage so that it can read video.

* Overview 

SICRAMA Infotech is a multicity, Agricultural Research Software development and Software Electronics based organization, in Nagpur and Pune, Maharashtra Which is having it's headquarter in Nagpur, Maharashtra. Specializing across various arenas of the IT and Electronic industry, SICRAMA Info Tech has skilled the craft in various technologies like Geographic Information System (GIS). Artificial Intelligence (Ai), Machine Learning (ML). Flutter Technology, Internet of Things (IOT) and many more. The unique commingle of in-depth domain understanding and insight with cutting edge technical competence gives SICRAMA Info Tech an upper hand to high quality services to our clients across the globe


* Our Vision 

We share a vision of dedicating our intelligence and expertise to help create a world that is
strengthen through Information Technology. This means inventing new technologies. As we
continue to turn more successful and accomplished new height, we see ourselves support our customers to expedite their business through the application of innovative technologies. The presence of our vision lies in building strong and trustworthy relationships with its clients


* Our Mission 

To achieve and maintain the confidence, trust and loyalty of our clients. Everything SICRAMA Info
Tech has achieved and will achieve is due to the excellent and exceptional relationship it shares with
its customer. We, at Sicrama Info Tech believe that these relationship are the company's most
priceless and precious assets. With you, we create and deliver business and technology solutions
that fit your needs and drive the results you want
